attributes.action: Abolish society in order that we can start again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Clearly everything's gone to Hell over the last 50 years; all the resources are being   used up an alarming rate,over half the planet lives in extreme poverty and all power seems to have become concentrated within a small cabal of elites. So let's scrap everything and start again along more altruistic lines. 
Government should be small and local, concerned with sustainability not increasing speres of influence with armed coercion and aggressive foreign policies.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
